item.title: Multichannel Lockin v2.10.1.23
item.description:
Product: Multichannel Lockin v2.10.1.23
Company: LevyLab
Release Date: Tue, 30 Jun 2020 20:31:18 -0400
Packager: Patrick Irvin

Description: Multichannel Lockin for National Instruments' Dynamic Signal Acquisition hardware (4431, 4461, 4462). This version is configured to handle multiple cards (up to 16) for simultaneous, synchronized AI/AO. You can configure a number of analog outputs (up to 32) to output sine, square, sawtooth, or triangle functions with DC offsets. Each of the analog inputs (up to 32) can be demodulated at multiple frequencies.

Release Notes: [2.10.1.23]
- Issue #21: fix lockin channel ring control
- Issue #24: fix issues with setting multiple reference frequencies
- Change handling of mouse events inside cluster controls
- Change AI graph labels
item.dc:creator: LevyLab

item.title: Multichannel Lockin v2.10.0.22
item.description:
Product: Multichannel Lockin v2.10.0.22
Company: LevyLab
Release Date: Fri, 26 Jun 2020 15:26:52 -0400
Packager: Patrick Irvin

Description: Multichannel Lockin for National Instruments' Dynamic Signal Acquisition hardware (4431, 4461, 4462). This version is configured to handle multiple cards (up to 16) for simultaneous, synchronized AI/AO. You can configure a number of analog outputs (up to 32) to output sine, square, sawtooth, or triangle functions with DC offsets. Each of the analog inputs (up to 32) can be demodulated at multiple frequencies.

Release Notes: [2.10.0.22]
- update AO/AI DAQ loops to parallel loops with 16 instances, allowing dynamic scaling to maximum 16 DAQ cards (32 synchronized AO/AI when using 4461 cards)
- new APIs:
- setAIDAQ: configure AI DAQ hardware
- setAODAQ: configure AO DAQ hardware
- getRefreshTime: get the lockin refresh time
item.dc:creator: LevyLab

item.title: Multichannel Lockin v2.9.12.21
item.description:
Product: Multichannel Lockin v2.9.12.21
Company: LevyLab
Release Date: Thu, 25 Jun 2020 17:35:27 -0400
Packager: Patrick Irvin

Description: Multichannel Lockin for National Instruments' Dynamic Signal Acquisition hardware (4431, 4461, 4462). This version is configured to handle multiple cards for simultaneous, synchronized AI/AO. You can configure a number of analog outputs (up to 8) to output sine, square, sawtooth, or triangle functions with DC offsets. Each of the analog inputs (up to 8) can be demodulated at multiple frequencies.

Release Notes: [2.9.12.21]
- enable scrollbars in all FP graphs
item.dc:creator: LevyLab
